title: VAST Visual Audio Sensory Theater FLAC
description:
Complete album in FLAC

Please add TPB trackers...







Please NOTE! Although FLAC is Lossless in some cases it compresses the db stream to save space! DB is volume! So make sure you normalize all your FLAC to -1db!  I recommend adobe audition....

What is normalization?

The Normalize effect amplifies the entire file or selection equally. For example, if the original audio reaches a loud peak of 80% and a quiet low of 20%, normalizing to 100% amplifies the loud peak to 100% and the quiet low to 40%.
